original_text: For the lips of a strange woman drop as an honeycomb, and her mouth is smoother than oil:
korean_text: 대저 음녀의 입술은 꿀을 떨어뜨리며 그의 입은 기름보다 미끄러우나

sentences.original_text: For the lips of a strange woman drop as an honeycomb
sentences.korean_translation: 이방 여인의 입술은 벌집처럼 꿀을 떨어뜨리고

sentences.original_text: and her mouth is smoother than oil:
